verses.text: 天上的敬拜這些事以後，我觀看，見天上有一道門開著；並且有我第一次聽見的那個好像號筒的聲音，對我說：「你上這裡來！我要把以後必定發生的事指示你。」

words.note: Often refers to 'heaven' in a religious context.

verses.text: 立刻，我在靈裡，就看見有一個寶座，設立在天上，有一位坐在寶座上。

words.note: Refers to being 'in the Spirit' or 'in spirit'.
Refers to a royal or divine throne.
Often refers to 'heaven' in a religious context.
Refers to a royal or divine throne.

verses.text: 那位坐著的，看來好像碧玉和紅寶石，又有彩虹圍繞著寶座，看來好像綠寶石。

words.note: Refers to a royal or divine throne.

verses.text: 寶座的周圍有二十四個座位，上面坐著二十四位長老，身穿白衣，頭戴金冠。

words.note: Refers to a royal or divine throne.
Refers to a specific office in the church or heavenly court.
A common biblical motif symbolizing purity or salvation.

verses.text: 有閃電、響聲、雷轟從寶座中發出；又有七枝火炬在寶座前點著，這就是 神的七靈。

words.note: Refers to a royal or divine throne.
Refers to a royal or divine throne.
Refers to the divine being, God.
The Seven Spirits of God, a reference from Revelation.

verses.text: 寶座前有一個看來好像水晶的玻璃海。在寶座中間和寶座周圍有四個活物，前後布滿了眼睛。

words.note: Lit. 'precious seat'

verses.text: 第一個活物像獅子，第二個活物像牛犢，第三個活物的臉面像人，第四個活物像飛鷹。

words.note: Specifically refers to a young cattle.
More formal than just 臉.

verses.text: 四個活物各有六個翅膀，裡外布滿了眼睛。他們晝夜不停地說：「聖哉！聖哉！聖哉！主、全能的 神，昔在、今在、以後要來的那一位。」

words.note: More literary than '白天黑夜'.
Refers to the divine entity.
A biblical expression for God's eternal nature.
A biblical expression for God's eternal nature.

verses.text: 每逢四個活物把榮耀、尊貴、感謝獻給那坐在寶座上，活到永永遠遠的那一位的時候，

words.note: Refers to esteemed status or noble quality.
A reduplicated idiom emphasizing eternity.

verses.text: 二十四位長老就俯伏在坐在寶座上那一位的面前，敬拜那活到永永遠遠的，又把他們的冠冕放在寶座前，說：

words.note: A reduplicated idiom emphasizing eternity.

verses.text: 「主、我們的 神，你是配得榮耀、尊貴、權能的，因為你創造了萬有，萬有都是因著你的旨意而存在，而被造的。」

words.note: A title for God or Christ.
The leading space is a reverence marker for God.
Often refers to divine power.
Marks the preceding phrase as an attribute of 'you'.
Lit. 'myriad things'.
Lit. 'myriad things'.
Often refers to God's will.
Passive voice construction.
Completes the passive structure, forming 'that which was created'.
